discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: Since we regularly forget to put things to `GRing.Theory`, it's probably good to check the whole diff of ssralg after the latest release to find this kind of mistake before the next release.

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: Actually `regular_comAlgType` and `regular_comUnitAlgType` have not been exported yet. (#406)

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: This is a dumb fix I will self-merge now.

commits.author: CohenCyril
commits.message:
fix in ssralg

Export the lemmas `commrB`, `commr_sum` and  `commr_prod`
